pages.text: $(li)The Stone Shovel is the direct upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_shovel)Wooden Shovel$(/l).$(br)$(li)It has a greater durability than the last one.

pages.name: Stone Shovel
pages.text: It can be used to create Grass Path right clicking on Dirt and Grass Block and obtain Snow Balls digging Snow Blocks.
$(li)$(l:patchouli:villagers/toolsmith)Toolsmiths$(/l) will exchange your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l) by Stone Shovels.
